mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Francis H. Pierpont Civil War Telegrams
mdRecord.dcterms:title: Russell, David A. to Pierpont, Francis H.
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Russell, David A.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: F.H. Pierpoint [Francis H. Pierpont] Wheeling Oct 18th 1861. By Telegraph from Pomeroy . 18th 1861. Capt Brown's company stationed at spencer Roane Co Va are out of provisions and I was dispatched to Parkersburg to get some & I cannot get any wagons or guards to take it to them & I want to know what to do immediately Russell Serg't Co C4th Regt 44W184&206col
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Russell, David A.
Pomeroy, Ohio
Wheeling, (West) Virginia
Pierpont, Francis H.
